title: my account is in the process of transferring?
body: i made a ticket a few days ago (wednesday i believe) about an account i no longer had the info for. The help i received started 2 days after, asking for additional information which i gave, and didnt receive feedback for that one until a couple of hours ago. linked my account to my new email and reset the password. now when i go to log in it says its in the process of transferring, which i replied to my ticket within minutes about. its the weekend, i work long hours, what does it take to get some real support from this game so i can play and relax while im off work. how long will this transfer take? ticket id is #30493951...............

replies.body: Thanks for letting us know, and I'm glad that Mooperdoodle was able to help get your account restored.  I looked at your ticket to check on things for you, and he's in the process of performing repairs including the transfer.  Hit him up in your ticket if you have any concerns, but hang tight-  it should be done in a bit!  I hope that helps!

i responded to him in my ticket about what was up with the transfer because the account is linked to NA already there shouldnt be a transfer of any sort, he never mentioned anything about the transfer, an eta, or that it was even taking place. he also hasnt responded back to me after i replied to him saying my account was restored about the transfer problem. do you know if the account was transferred to another server while it was not under my control?
Double checked and it looks like he responded back to your ticket.  Everything should be okay now.  :)

so he responded back saying the problem was fixed but now when i go to log in it says wrong password, i click to reset it and its not emailing me the link anymore. so idk if whatever he did reset the email it was linked to back to the email i no longer have access to, or if its just not going through at all.

Also when i try to log into the lol homepage it says my account doesnt exist, literally after resetting my password with the same information. ive checked lolskill, and logged into my other account to pull the account ive lost up, and its still in NA, so i have not a clue what exactly needs to be transferred nor why
